text: __NOTOC__ Rudolf Sintzenich (13 July 1889 – 24 December 1948) was a general in the Wehrmacht of Nazi Germany during World War II who commanded several divisions. He was a recipient of the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross. ==Awards and decorations== * Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross on 15 August 1940 as generalmajor and commander of 33rd Infantry Division Fellgiebel 2000, p. 326. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * Category:1889 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Lieutenant generals of the German Army (Wehrmacht) Category:Recipients of the Knight's Cross of the Iron Cross Category:German prisoners of war in World War II
title: Rudolf Sintzenich
